price: 89. Yalli ken nammayak Firqawnaa kee kay makaabanat abten abaaró siinik oggolimtchik, toysa sinni diinil soolaay diggi ixxica, yi xaganaa kee yi meesisso numma kinnim Aaxige waa marih gita makataatina keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ قَدۡ أُجِيبَت دَّعۡوَتُكُمَا فَٱسۡتَقِيمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعَآنِّ سَبِيلَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla qad ujībat daʿwatukumā fa-is'taqīmā walā tattabiʿānni sabīla alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
translations: So you two (keep to the) straight way
